name: Project G
description: In this retro-styled side-scrolling shooter, you pilot a sleek submarine through earths oceans (25+ levels) fighting rogue cybernetic fishbots. The future's a difficult place and you must earn credits/ pick up materials as you progress, using them to upgrade/ change your ship to match your playing style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 766 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 766 MB available space

reviews.review_text: As a fan of alot of old Shooter games, this touches on everything i ever wanted in a shooter game, and if this is the first game that this company is releasing i am looking forward to any games that are developed later.  if you are a fan of games like Gladius or old school shooters, buy this game
It's a decent game, has its charms, but nothing spectacular.
